column4: can someone help me i cant get into my ipod with ssh... it says "ssh: connect to host 192.168.2.9 port 22: Connection refused"
- you need a frontend for iptables firewall and open tcp port 22
- install lokkit or firestarter and open port 22
hey how can i config it? i cant find it
- which did you install, type the name in a terminal window
- have you tried ssh -l user ip format?
- type sudo lokkit, uncheck trusted interfaces, check ssh and probably dhcp. depending on your isp.
i checked ssh and dhcp but im a little new to using the terminal... how do i format the ip ?
- you use the account name you use then type ssh -l username xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx
- netstat -tunap should show port 22  listening, sudo iptables -L needs to show ACCEPT ssh
